website_summaries.verdict: With its class-leading performance and admirable feature set, the Lenovo G580 is an excellent value with an affordable price tag that gives users plenty of bang for their buck.

customer_reviews.title: Worst laptop ever
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is the worst laptop I have ever bought, the mouse pad is so sensitive that many things get pressed while trying to use it, and sometimes things happen without even pressing them. Also the laptop crashes on it's own after startup on many occasions ever since it was bought, the laptop freezes and square pixels just appear everywhere. It is not reliable to use with sensitive work due to the fact it crashes all the time. I can't use it with my car and diagnostics software in case I mess up the vehicles ECU whilst connected to the laptop and it crashes. In total it was a complete waste of money and a very nasty laptop
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Abdur-Rahman

customer_reviews.title: all good really. Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Over a year and a half later he writes a review. Well, all good really. Still going strong. I use it for work, mainly running office, project, visio etc. I would say that I am not really taxing it. I travel a lot, so I am carrying it around and it has stood the test of time in this respect. Storage is great. Speed is still good. Cannot really say anything bad about it other than the mouse pad (for me) is slightly out of place, too close to the left. So you tend to touch it too much when typing which sends your text off in another place.
customer_reviews.author: Savy

customer_reviews.title: One of the best laptops that I have found
customer_reviews.text: One of the best laptops that I have found , it's never let me down using it for work and on holiday .. superb processor and great value purchase , I love the sleek design and the colour is my favourite , I'm able to use it to upload my art work and it connects super fast with my wifi and printer - I'm shocked that this is just as good as my MacBook from work but I love to use this more , I've never had any problems with it crashing or slowing down , I trust Lenovo products
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Obee

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: ordered this in emergency since needed a second machine and have been impressed by its performance given the price paid
customer_reviews.author: AHess

customer_reviews.title: Don,t be fooled
customer_reviews.text: Purchased used laptop , seller had reverted hard drive to factory setting,,when i opened windows and configured the internat connection , it automatically went on line to seek up dates,, a total of 115 required, laptop would / could not down load onto the hatd drive,, sent unit back to seller at a cost of £14.75 only to be fobed of that the pc worked find when they checked which was total rubish on the sellers part to save a few bob.
customer_reviews.author: David Skelton

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this laptop for 5 months now with no problems. It is ideal for what I need it for - internet, light work and watching movies. For the price it is excellent! It has lost a star only because the mouse 'touch thingy' is very sensitive and for the first 6 weeks found myself going into lots of different things when all I was trying to do was click a button on the internet. One minute I would be in photos and the next in weather! Also Windows 8..... well what can I say..... disaster..... but not the fault of this laptop :-)
customer_reviews.author: Natasha W

customer_reviews.title: Lasted almost 12 months - rubbish.
customer_reviews.text: At first glance I thought this was the bargain of the century, 1tb hard drive and 6gb ram. I bought it as a replacement for my worn out Sony Vaio, I wish I had just bought another Vaio. The mouse was annoying and would flit to the awful windows 8 screen all the time. Cheap keyboard, USB connections were unreliable, and the hard drive went POP !!! one day. I thought I would give the Lenovo a chance, I wish I hadn't. Get a Toshiba, they are inexpensive and reliable. Pay a bit more for a Sony Vaio and be happy. Or just go for it and get a mac. Never again, you have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: A. S. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I tried 4 attempts to get this unit sent out to me but it never arrived. It was stopped by Customs and Amazon couldn't get it sorted so that they put a copy of the invoice on the outside. This was sent to my Spanish home and Spanish customs want a 5% import duty to be applied and Amazon wouldn't put the invoice on the outside so they didn't know what to charge and therefore sent it back. I can't rate the unit just the delivery which never happened.
customer_reviews.author: Caz in Maspalomas

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is a good laptop for both home and work use. Windows 8 is quite hard to navigate and the mouse pad is very sensitive so often you touch it with your hands when typing and it flips to something else which can be frustrating, but it's fine when you get used to it. The lap top does not come with any office programmes so you have to buy these separately and the same with security software so you need to pay all of this on top of the lap top cost.
customer_reviews.author: londonlass

customer_reviews.title: 4 months on and the keyboard is starting to play up.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little computer, sleek, light and stylish with a wonderful display, excellent memory and fast operating system, but the keyboard is starting to break! Some of the buttons take a hefty push to get them to work, making typing anything (especially this) difficult to type at any decent speed. I have been unable to scroll left or up with the keyboard for at least a month and a half now. This laptop was supposed to last me for a year or two at the least hassle-free. I don't think it is going to last this year.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Bentham

customer_reviews.title: Great value middle range laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop good value and fast enough that my son does not complain. Only 2 small negatives. No light to indicate if it is on cap lock which is a bit annoying when typing in passwords and the pin plug at side to connect to screen for PowerPoint presentations is not a universal one but will try to get a lead to correct this.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: If only I could give it Zero
customer_reviews.text: My fault, you get what you pay for. Screen flickers, battery runs out in under an hour, then only charges to 60%. These appear to be common faults and don't bother trying to contact Lenovo. Their web-site is totally user un-friendly. I guess they want you to pay for help/advice. My advice is to buy a reputable make, from a store, as you can then take it back. Amazon offer no help.
customer_reviews.author: Oakland Collectibles

customer_reviews.title: Quiet enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for a little play about laptop and to do some basic gaming as well as bit of buisness work its not too bad as a laptop for the basics even though i don't enjoy running windows 8 but it is always trying to update but otherwise it is an overall good product also it came with a slightly broken left click button but it works and the battery life is slightly short but for a short life battery it is a good bit of kit
customer_reviews.author: Daniel West

customer_reviews.title: great except for windows 8
customer_reviews.text: this is a great laptop with powerful processor - personally though i dont like the windows 8 set up its a bit too much of a gimic - i want the laptop to be a working tool not a play thing or a phone they have gone too far to the app side with 8 - but the laptop is fine just wish they had put windows 7 on it !
customer_reviews.author: ernest swift

customer_reviews.title: Faulty DVD Burner
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop, but the DVD burner is rubbish! Keeps producing coasters with Verbatim DVD-r's. To late to return to Amazon, so stuck with a faulty computer because I didn't try to copy a non copyright DVD sooner. Be warned! Don't buy a Lenovo, because they obviously use very cheap internal burners! Gutted.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop, but it does have its issues. For starters, Windows 8 is a bit of a pain and within a month of having it, I had to completely wipe the system because there was something installed on Windows 8 that was making itself crash (?) and the USB ports are incredibly temperamental. Other than that, I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: What a great Laptop. Great key action and large display. Works well, and looks great!. Would purchase again. Didn't know much about Lenova to start with, but its a real contender to the leading brands!.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B.

customer_reviews.title: LIFE BEGINS AT 70 LAPTOP GRANNY
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS BOUGHT FOR MY MOTHER AS A 70TH BIRTHDAY PRESENT AND SHE LOVES IT ,THE STYLE AND COLOUR IS GREAT AND IT IS VERY EASY TO USE ,THIS IS HER FIRST LAPTOP AS BEFORE SHE HAD A NET BOOK ,SHE LOVES IT THAT MUCH SHE HAS USED IT EVERYDAY SINCE AND THE PRICE WOW A FANTASTIC BARGAIN PRICE TOO ,I READ ALL THE REVIEWS BEFORE BUYING THIS LAPTOP AND AM GLAD THAT IN THE END I DECIDED TO BUY IT TO SEE WHAT IT WAS LIKE FOR MYSELF .
customer_reviews.author: Miss Blessed

customer_reviews.title: New to Windows 8
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as all the reviews were very good, never experienced windows 8 before, but found it easy to use and great to navigate, in fact I loved it so much I then bought a windows 8 mobile phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son nearly a year ago and have had no problems with it. It looks the part, It's fast enough for most things and feels well made. Nice bright screen but as for windows 8 you either love it or hate it!
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop looks lovely and is very 'modern' with Windows 8 but it took me quite a while to work things out. The main practical problem with it is the mouse pad - just not good. I use it with a proper mouse and it's better but the pad is just dreadful and I find it unusable. Even my 20 year old daughter was appalled at the mouse pad so it's not just my age.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne E. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Bought June 2013 for my wife. All went well ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought June 2013 for my wife. All went well for several months - apart from the touchpad (it's impossible to use without a mouse) which was hypersensitive. After about 10 months, it started to get buggy e.g. taking ages to boot up, crashing etc. Then deteriorated very fast to the point where it was unusable - as another reviewer said, it gets stuck in a self-diagnostic loop. You can't even open it any more to retrieve documents. You have been warned...
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: First rate laptop
customer_reviews.text: I brought this laptop for my son who wanted one to play games on such as Minecraft and to do school work. He took a little time to get used to Windows 8 but now he loves it. It is very fast and user friendly. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Rob Taylor

customer_reviews.title: For the money 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Only the tech spec on the processor looks rather weak but it does not seem noticeably worse than my i5 for everyday usage. Quality keyboard - bought for my nice's daughter (14 y.o.) and she loves it...
customer_reviews.author: Roman Szwaba

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T GET IN BIOS, MOTHERBOARD NEEDS REPLACE
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is ok because is cheaper, but it has a big problem I can't get in BIOS, from different repair laptop shops they told me it's impossible get in BIOS, the laptop need a new motherboard. Maybe is only my laptop or maybe no. But from Amazon refund me my money without problem. They understood everything. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Fab Laptop
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic laptop that does what it says on the tin. My trusty eight year old laptop has served me well, but this machine has brought me up to date with the speed, memory, style and the quietness of the fan (am amazed by this compared to my old one). Hope it gives me as much pleasure as I expect from it.
customer_reviews.author: Bailiff Bill

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for my son to play computer games on and for homework. I was a little concerned that it wouldn't be suitable for his games but have found it compatible for all of his games so far. This product is excellent value for money and does all of the tasks that we required it for.
customer_reviews.author: paulypops

customer_reviews.title: Present for hubby who loves is it and is never ...
customer_reviews.text: Present for hubby who loves is it and is never off it. It is a cheap computer and yet does the business well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great and the price was £100 cheaper than in the shops. Delivery was very good and on time. I am not keen on the Microsoft system that is on it but that is not the fault of the product or seller.
customer_reviews.author: vicky henley

customer_reviews.title: not bad when on top form but on two occasions iv ...
customer_reviews.text: not bad when on top form but on two occasions iv ad to set it back to factory settings.otherwise not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: In very good condition and arrived very promptly. Loaded up with Windows 8. Good value at just over £200. Not had the make of computer before, but seems pretty efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Pt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and value for money. The extremely sensitive touch pad is very annoying. Arrived quickly. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Great value purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had this laptop for several months now, very easy to use, nice and quick, love windows 8 now im used to it, took me a couple of weeks, but then was on vista before so user issues rather than system. Kids do their homework, we browse the net, and we watch movies on the TV via the laptop, got lod of our photos and videos saved on it now all round fab purchase very please looks pretty too...
customer_reviews.author: magusequus

customer_reviews.title: Good start but sadly went downhill
customer_reviews.text: All started well with this laptop but it quickly became apparent there was a problem with the screen powering up. This happened only a few days after taking delivery of the laptop and after first considering it to be a slight blip it soon became obvious it was a defect. It's a shame as everything else seemed fine in the short time I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs E Hayden

customer_reviews.title: i have already got one
customer_reviews.text: as I have already had one lenovo G580 so when i required a second one this was my obvious choice as my preasent lenovo g580 is a wonderfull piece of kit
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Though it was used, but it did the job I wanted it to. 👌
customer_reviews.author: Job Martins

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: these are just perfect love this laptop it does everthing I need and for my husband aswell thankyou love it
customer_reviews.author: linda froggatt

customer_reviews.title: Unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: The worst lap top I have ever used. It has a mind of it's own. It continuously moves the cursor to a different point in the sentence or paragraph I am writing. It's so annoying. It's incredibly unresponsive - wipes whole paragraphs of text. I wish i'd spent more money and would never recommend anyone buy a Lenovo
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Some of the keys stopped working
customer_reviews.text: A week after delivery, some 5-10 keys of the keyboard stopped working. If one of these keys is part of you password, you even cannot login. I could have returned it, but I already installed expensive software (that is difficult to transfer to another computer let alone the hassle). I ended up buying an external USB keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop and totally recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop real value for money and delivered on time we bought this as a back up to our other laptop and having been using this most of the time
customer_reviews.author: john maceira

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic laptop
customer_reviews.text: I am not the expert in the use of laptops but this laptop is fantastic.I found it very quick ,not very complicated easy to work ,I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jvrachnis

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3 years its. Max for lenovo laptops lost my pictures documents and many more
customer_reviews.author: www

customer_reviews.title: fantastic value fantastic laotop
customer_reviews.text: so happy this laptop set up in 5 min find nothing wrong so easy to use im not a computer minded man but found this easy would give this 10 stars+
customer_reviews.author: rod morgan

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Is the most excellent product that i have ever ordered from Amazon!!! I can not believe how good this laptop really is!!
customer_reviews.author: Sumayyah Khan

customer_reviews.title: windows8 with no touchscreen no no
customer_reviews.text: This is good value plenty of computer for your money but is a little frustrating as the Windows 8is not supported by a touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: the meister

customer_reviews.title: A fault of which you should be aware!
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 months use the laptop no longer charged. The input connection between the charger and laptop between loose (i.e the pin) so I can no longer use it. Until this point, I was happy with the happy but detested the Windows 8 on it! I'mtrying to getthe laptop repaired under its warranty but no joy yet :-(
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: good laptop but teRrible wifi
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop apart from the wifi. Had to buy a wifi adaptor dongle to supplement the poor excuse fitted and as wifi is a natural expectation it was a real letdown
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent experience and product. i am very happy with the transaction.
customer_reviews.author: magister

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For Money.....
customer_reviews.text: Very,very,verry happy with new Lenovo G580 Windows 8 laptop, bought 2nd hand off of amazon for £170 just a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dan Hardy

customer_reviews.title: loving the colour
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this new laptop and it was delivered within 5 days which was excellent. Took no time to set up and sync with various other pieces of soft and hardware. The only thing i'm not sure about is the Windows 8, which is no fault of the laptop; however this will take a little time to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: NATION

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter who had never used ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who had never used Windows 8 but now have added the traditional windows menu which has improved it bro her. Still getting to know her way around it but is definitely making it her own now.
customer_reviews.author: Andy in Lancs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop
customer_reviews.text: For the price this laptop is unbeatable, Windows eight seem to be posing problems to some people but the lenovo has sailed me through it no bother. If price is an issue I doubt you could do better
customer_reviews.author: ianbarclay

customer_reviews.title: Cool blue, lovely full screen laptop
customer_reviews.text: Windows 8 a pain in the bum. Upgraded to Windows 8.1 fantastic. Added solid state drive boots within 3 secs. For a laptop of this price this phenomenal !!! Recommend
customer_reviews.author: John Stewart

customer_reviews.title: laptop
customer_reviews.text: well this is my second Lenovo laptop cause my first one just went and didn't work but having my second one so far I have not had any problems with it so I must got a faulty one in the first place but I am very happy with my laptop
customer_reviews.author: maria sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop - windows 8 not so good however getting used to it. It helps to disconnect touchpad pressing Fn and F6 and use mouse this stops text jumping around. Overall great value for money and quick delivery to Spain for less than £10 - thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: margaret gill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Could not have been a better laptop for my needs. It is very responsive and the screen crystal clear. I would certainly recommend this product which was recommended to me by another satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Windows 8 keypad operated on Lenovo G580 laptop
customer_reviews.text: window8 does not operate well on the keyboard with this computer. The mouse pad is not recessed but it is flush with the front panel. This causes problems when typing - i.e you are more likely to hit the mouse pad in error.
customer_reviews.author: David McGiveron

customer_reviews.title: best
customer_reviews.text: this pc is da bomb even though the processor is not that good but if you're not a hardcore a gamer this pc is for you its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sab

customer_reviews.title: Best low-price laptop that I knoe of avaiable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product,, it really is value for money with latest Windons 8 OS complete wit latest Apps maybe audio could be better but is more than adequate Displlay is very good
customer_reviews.author: peter dancey

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: had problems with this laptop from the start, trying to solve the problem was very difficult going through the right channels, solved the problem with help from friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Pitchfork

customer_reviews.title: lenovo g580 laptop
customer_reviews.text: bought for the price does exactly what i need and would recommend it to my family and friends its been great
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is well spec'd and has performed well since I got it. The only downside is Windows 8 comes per-installed and no one knows how it works, as it is such a radical change from Windows 7.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo G580 Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Laptop ok Windows 8 a pain in the bum, would like to change it to windows 7 why wont they give you a choice
customer_reviews.author: M Lowe

customer_reviews.title: unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Cant give a good review as Kept freezing and crashing so wasn't able to review properly so was sent back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Auldreekie

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Nice to use once I found a way around the awful windows 8. Keyboard has a friendly feel to it and screen quality is excellent, just a shame it was not offered with windows 7 as an option.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Burkinshaw

customer_reviews.title: It seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.text: It was received on time. It is not as fast as other computers but I do manage to do a lot staff on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my son, he uses it everyday for his schoolwork. Haven't encountered any problems with the system so far.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McCulloch

customer_reviews.title: hdmi port doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop, was very happy with mine until I ealised that the hdmi port didn't work. I use the hdmi port often and was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alan porter

customer_reviews.title: excellent support
customer_reviews.text: thank u very much for your excellent support u have provided me even though i haven't received the product first time.
customer_reviews.author: slimthapa

customer_reviews.title: Windows 8
customer_reviews.text: Windows 8 is a disaster, and therefore obstucts this computers ability to function, as well as it would on Windows 7
customer_reviews.author: Ambrose Donohue

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: For £300 and next day delivery.Huge 1tb hard drive 6gb ram you cant go wrong.The only thing is the processor is not an i3 but it's got everything else you would need.
customer_reviews.author: r bartley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife as a surprise present, she is very happy with quality, service was excellent and surprise element was brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: kevin o'sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a year and I love it
customer_reviews.author: yinka

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back as it wouldnt even boot up
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: The laptop my son needed
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is excellent, just what we needed, the pad is quick and after a while even I have learnt to use it nicely. I think it actually is good for the brains to learn a new not-so-recommended Win8. When we need a big screen for movies etc. the Lenovo is easily connected to the old PC stuff: display, keyboard, mouse and speakers. So, less than 400€ for a laptop and PC together was an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: very nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: its a very nice laptop easy to use its just a shame it came with windows 8, I have up graded my broken laptop for this one it built well and works well, I used to have vista which I could choose when to go on line to do things but windows 8 you cant even do email in your desktop its all apps and online and the back up program you have to pay for so that's no good but there that's more a complaint to Microsoft than it is to Lenovo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second time lucky
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and it kept crashing so contacted Amazon, returned it and now have my second. It is great, very fast and once I got used to the windows 8 I have grown to love it. It looks nice, the screen is clear and the keyboard large enough for my fat fingers not to make too many typos.
customer_reviews.author: catsholiday

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to use as my regular PC and it has worked out really well. This laptop is easy to use, very responsive and reliable. I love Windows 8 - it did take some getting used to and I'm still configuring the start screen to look how I want it to, but honestly, it's brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S. Pandya

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: really love this laptop. the colour is really nice the screen is nice and big and great quality.. overall its absolutely amazing for the price .. only reason I gave 4* and not 5* is because its an windows 8 and hard for me to get use to with the aps etc. apart from that great buy im happy
customer_reviews.author: Goddess

customer_reviews.title: lovely laptop
customer_reviews.text: laptop is lovely and fast, very responsive, i've not had a problem with the track pad as a lot of people on here have commented on, but usually i prefer to use a wireless mouse anyway. the only downside is that it comes with windows 8 which no on wants on a laptop, but some free downloads can turn 8 into a desktop so its all good.
customer_reviews.author: asa turner

customer_reviews.title: Laptop
customer_reviews.text: It's taken a lot of time for me to decide on a a laptop and finally settled for the Lenovo G580. It is a great little number for a very reasonable price. The only thing I am struggling with is Windows 8, but I'm sure that will get easier with time.
customer_reviews.author: LouLouW

customer_reviews.title: laptop ok windows 8 dire
customer_reviews.text: For the price its a good laptop, sadly windows 8 is so bad I am still using my old computer, getting back to previous windows is nearly impossible for non techy people, buy windows 7 unless you love wasting hours trying to work out why nothing works, nightmare. Lenovo generally OK though.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews, here and on other websites and still decided to buy it. No regrets so far. Good machine, fast, I didn't have any problems to set it up. Is Windows 8 a pain in the behind? It most certainly is, but it's not the fault of this computer's makers. It's a decent good machine, big memory and big hard drive, great price. Maybe people have found problems to play games but, since for me the main purpose of this machine is work, I could not care less if Angry Birds or whatever game does not look too good. So far so good. I am happy with this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Farje

customer_reviews.title: great value for money
customer_reviews.text: great laptop, the only suggestion I would make is, 'think carefully about whether you want to go to Windows 8' it doesn't suit everybody. Windows 7 may be more familiar and useable. My 13 year old grandaughter uses it easily and loves the laptop. Her father prefers Windows 7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good value for money laptop
customer_reviews.text: Tho it too, a while to get my stuff loaded, and to get to grips with Windows 8, now I love it for its fast processing, huge memory etc!
customer_reviews.author: Christina B Wojtak

customer_reviews.title: Stunning laptop !
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to the Windows 8, as I am a Mac man for many years indeed. Fast processor and huge storage capacity with HD resolution screen. Top notch for such a low price and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: very nice lenovo with win 8 included
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish, very cool (1TB of storage space). Still, at updates of Win 8 failed - at 15% stalled. Tried automatically to restart the updates installation but without success (actually for 3 times). It is still intelligent to reset the previous settings (prior update was initiated). There might be a win 8 problem rather than a hardwer problem. I love the awsome win 8 but still, it's a new peace of soft and therefore fails as always in case of Microsoft meanwhile :)
customer_reviews.author: CI

customer_reviews.title: A good cheap laptop.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is great for its price, however it comes with out software so it may help if you ave a copy at home. The start up has been slow at times and the touch pad very sensitive but this problem has been mastered now. I think this is a great manufacturer of laptops and would recommend this to anyone. Gathers dust easily but can be brushed of easily. Web cam good, keyboard good. Just wish it didnt have to update every 7 days or so. Still trying to stop this setting.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: lenova g580 laptop
customer_reviews.text: found it very fast easy to use dont know why everyone moaning about windows 8,upgraded to this laptop from a dell insperion windows vista, very happy great value
customer_reviews.author: karen strout

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop for £300
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Had this laptop about 3 weeks & everything works great. In fact there was no need to load up anything, wifi & apps in windows 8 just worked immediately. The processor seems fast enough to handle everything we use like general internet, I player & home videos. Seems particularly good picture quality. We would definitely recommend this from our experience so far. If you are looking for something very sleek in design you may be a little disappointed but this doesn't bother us - not as sleek as HPs g series in my opinion but seems easier to use to me, especially the keyboard (accuType).
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: 6GB memory, 1000GB disk and Intel - for under £300. Sounds too good to be true, but I thought it as worth a try since I could easily return it. Turns out to be a great system and fortunately I could still run it in Windows 7 mode. The only niggle is that the battery charge level has been erratic showing "plugged in, not charging" and over two weeks reducing down to 95% and then overnight going up to 100%; but I'll live with that for now.
customer_reviews.author: CMW-Devon

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I want
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase, as I was looking for a laptop that was inexpensive but give me all I needed and this has exceeded y wishes. As with most new machines it has Windows 8 on it that is taking a bit of getting used to, but I am getting there.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Geoffrey Byford

customer_reviews.title: smart, great to use
customer_reviews.text: Windows 8 needs some getting used to, but the computer is another Lenovo winner for us. The touchpad is highly sensitive - again, needs some getting used to. Overall, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, even with Windows 8.
customer_reviews.text: Yes windows 8 will take some getting used to (but sure my granddaughter will help me out). The laptop itself is brilliant, easy to set up, and extremely good for the price. Would recommend it to anyone looking for an easy to operate unit. Nice one Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly Postman

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard and touchpad are a recipe for insanity
customer_reviews.text: In short - performance is fine. Windows 8 is a nightmare. The touchpad is extremely annoying(too sensitive) and not easily disabled when a mouse is connected. I've upgraded the drivers to no avail. The keyboard is horrible - touchtyping is impossible, and layout is different to two other Lenovos which both have great keyboards, The keyboard was mentioned as a highlight by another reviewer, so very disappointed with it. When I hit the space bar, it registers about half the time. I'm about to replace Windows 8 which may help with the touchpad issue.
customer_reviews.author: C. Coyne

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this priduct.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter to complete her college work. She loves it. Also enjoys gaming, streaming and Facebook. She found it easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Gillydogs

customer_reviews.title: Great product reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Basically does as it says on the tin, just the job for my son's school work at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr ADRIAN F COLTMAN

customer_reviews.title: RUBBISH!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item as it was such a good deal and have some great reviews, but the Item was faulty, the screen froze within 2 days or receiving it and it was a nightmare to send it back as it cost me over 35€ to return and I only received £3.99 in compensation as is the policy .... so one word to sum up...... RUBBISH!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: stephan H

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: A good spec laptop, nicely presented, sounds good, display brilliant, inbuilt webcam great. So superior to the laptop bought for not much more in price.. Downside Windows 8 YUK personal preference but managed to install prog to make it look like windows 7. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Laptop computer
customer_reviews.text: I found that it crashed frequently in the middle of work and automatically shut down and eventually started up again but I lost my work. Amazon has now accepted it back but I am out of pocket by £36 so will not be buying another on this make!
customer_reviews.author: Mac

product_meta.title: Lenovo G580 15.6-inch Laptop (Blue) - (Intel Celeron B830 1.8GHz Processor, 6GB RAM, 1TB HDD, DVDRW, LAN, WLAN, BT, Webcam, Integrated Graphics, Windows 8)
product_meta.description:
The solid and dependable Lenovo IdeaPad G580 comes with stylish blue cover. Click here to see a larger image. THE LENOVO IDEAPAD G580 - AFFORDABLE AND DEPENDABLE
Built to last and ultimately affordable, the Lenovo IdeaPad G580 laptops, featuring up to 3rd generation Intel Core processors, assure that users have all of their essentials in one place. With stereo speakers and an integrated DVD reader/writer, these laptops are great for basic multimedia and everyday computing tasks. Additional features such as the OneKey Rescue System provide additional peace of mind and help you to do more.

See the connectivity options available on the Lenovo IdeaPad G580 (Grey version shown). Click here to see the full image. MAINSTREAM PERFORMANCE
3RD GENERATION INTEL CORE PROCESSOR FAMILY*
The Lenovo IdeaPad G580 features the 3rd generation Intel Core family of processors, including the intelligent Intel Core i5 processor. When fast performance is needed for demanding tasks, the Intel Core i5 processor is the ideal choice. Users get a laptop with amazing performance and stunning visuals due to Intel's Hyper-Threading Technology, Intel Turbo Boost Technology 2.0, and a suite of visual enhancements.

*Available on selected models

HDMI FOR BIG SCREEN ENTERTAINMENT
You can also enjoy your multimedia on the big screen by using the built-in HDMI port to hook your laptop up to a HDTV, monitor or projector - ideal for sharing your favourite videos and movies with friends.

The 15.6" widescreen display can display your favourite movies and games in HD 720p resolution. Click here to see a larger image. FAST MEMORY AND SPACIOUS STORAGE
Whichever Lenovo IdeaPad G580 you choose, inside you'll find fast DDR3 RAM to help your laptop handle the most demanding multitasking. You'll also find a large hard drive perfect for storing your files and favourite multimedia.

INTEGRATED DVD READER/WRITER 
You'll also find that the IdeaPad G580 features an optical disc drive, to allow you to easily watch your favourite DVD movies, install your favourite games, or transfer files. You can also safely back up precious files onto a blank disc using the writing function, making it easier to protect and transport your media. 

Enhance your Windows 8 experience with the optimised software and hardware features of Lenovo EE8. Click here to see a larger image. INTEGRATED STEREO SPEAKERS
Enjoy and share the music and films you love with others, without the need for headphones. The IdeaPad G580 comes with two built-in stereo speakers, allowing you to enjoy great quality sound without wires.

WINDOWS 8 WITH LENOVO ENHANCED EXPERIENCE 8
Microsoft's sleekest, most innovative operating system yet. Created specifically for the new Windows 8 OS, Lenovo has combined the best hardware and software features to create Lenovo Enhanced Experience 8.

INTERACT
Type - the legendary Lenovo keyboards are now even better. Lenovo has set a new benchmark for the industry and added simplified controls for Windows 8. These award-winning designs are used across the Lenovo ranges, helping you to enjoy comfortable, convenient keyboard input wherever you are.

The AccuType keyboard is stylish, ergonomic, and will help make typing easier. Click here to see a larger image. CONNECT
Lenovo Cloud - Imagine your files, everywhere. Lenovo's online storage and cloud utilities allow you the freedom to choose your device and location. With 5 GB of free storage, you'll be able to secure and access your files wherever you are, on whatever machine you find yourself on.

DISCOVER
Exclusive Lenovo Content - Discover all the amazing things you can do with exclusive tools from Lenovo. Learn how to get the most from your PC with Lenovo Companion or monitor your system performance with Lenovo Support. Lenovo keeps you up to date and delivers music, game and video content you can't get from anyone else.

A World of Apps - Discover and download thousands of apps. Choose from Microsoft's Windows 8 store or Lenovo's curated collection of optimised apps.

Back-up and recover valuable data easily with the OneKey Rescue System. Click here to see a larger image. STYLISH DESIGN AND USABILITY
The IdeaPad G580 laptop is the perfect computing solution for a user looking for style and a little more flair than the traditional black or grey machine. 

The IdeaPad G580's design is not the only thing that makes using it a memorable experience. The IdeaPad G580 laptop comes with multiple features as standard, all combining to make usability as intuitive as possible, including an AccuType keyboard.

ACCUTYPE KEYBOARD
The AccuType keyboard you'll find on the Lenovo IdeaPad G580 is designed to help easy cleaning & maintenance and avoid the accumulation of dust and crumbs over time. The finger-friendly curved key shape and ergonomic spacebar will work together to make it easier to type and reduce the number of typos, wherever you find yourself working. Finally, the diamond-cut keypad is the very emphasis of sharp design, giving the whole layout of the IdeaPad G580 an attractive and pleasing appearance.

PEACE OF MIND
Lenovo Energy Management 7.0 will help you get the most performance out of your battery. Click here to see a larger image. ONEKEY RESCUE SYSTEM
You can rest at ease knowing OneKey Rescue System is there to simplify data backup and recovery, allowing you to focus on using your computer instead of worrying about its maintenance. With the touch of a button, users can restore the system and recover valuable data - the OneKey Rescue System also recovers essential system files in the event of corruption, and can be used to initiate a virus scan before entering Windows. 

You can also ensure that your data is always protected with DirectShare, which easily synchronises your files to another machine without connecting to the internet allowing you to have a copy of your data on another machine. 

LENOVO ENERGY MANAGEMENT 7.0
With Lenovo Energy Management 7.0, users are able to run their machine in a variety of different modes, depending on their needs. Power-Saver mode allows laptops to run exceptionally quietly with reduced fan noise. Balanced mode auto-detects user behaviour and knows when to run in a lower performance mode, allowing increased energy savings. High-Performance mode utilises a combination of high performance and thermal solution to increase performance levels.

Users can also protect and prolong their battery health by using features such as battery protection mode and battery gauge. Lenovo's energy management system can even monitor laptop behaviour and remind the user to choose battery modes that best suit their style of usage, thus extending the life of their battery.

THERMAL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
Lenovo's Thermal Management System makes it easy to monitor the temperature of your laptop and allow it to auto-adjust the fan-speed, assuring your computer is kept at the optimal temperature whilst producing the lowest possible noise. This system also features a de-dusting mode to boost maintenance and ensure the high performance of your laptop continues.



LEGAL DISCLAIMER
over 18 to purchase

BOX CONTAINS
Lenovo laptop
Battery
AC Adapter
User Guide

See more
feature_bullets: Not only affordable but also peace-of-mind - an easy-to-use system to help you detect and remove viruses, restore Windows system and create recovery discs
A new solid look and feel available in a range of colours
A user friendly Accu type keyboard for great typing experience
